author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Salem Bar Association launched the facility of e-filing of income tax returns for the benefit of its members and their family members during the New Year celebrations on the bar premises here on Monday. M. Tirumala Kumar, Principal Commissioner of Income Tax, inaugurated the new facility. He also launched the distribution of PAN cards to the advocate members.

N. Seshasayee, Principal District and Sessions Judge, who was the chief guest, urged the advocates to strictly adhere to the legal norms.

G. Ponnusamy, president of The Salem Bar Association, presided over the function and K. R. R. Ayyappamani, its secretary, offered felicitations.
title: Camp held to distribute PAN cards to lawyers
